def: A hypothetic radical (C6H4) occurring in certain derivatives ofbenzene; as, phenylene diamine.
A pie made of truffles, much esteemed by epicures.
A long-tailed monkey (Semnopithecus schislaceus), from themountainous districts of India.
The rust of any metal, esp. of brass or copper; verdigris.
Resembling sagenite; -- applied to quartz when containingacicular crystals of other minerals, most commonly rutile, alsotourmaline, actinolite, and the like.
Twofold; double. [R.] "Binal revenge, all this." Ford.
A trull or prostitute; a scold or gossip. [Obs.] [Written alsocallat.]
A widely used system of electric night signals in which aseries of double electric lamps (white and red) is arrangedvertically on a mast, and operated from a keyboard below.
A disease of horses, on which the mouth is so furred that theafflicted animal can not eat.
